menu.name: &aAuto Tool
lore: &fChange to the most suitable tool from your inventory

menu.name: &aBetter Infinity
lore: &fIf you are shooting with an Infinity Bow

BetterLoyalty.return: &aThe trident has been missing, called it back now.

CraftDrop.drop: &aCrafted all items and dropped them out.

menu.name: &aCraft Drop
lore: &fWhen you have opened the Crafting Inventory

DynamicLight.light: &aYou are holding a light source, light bless you.

menu.name: &aDynamic Light
lore: &fSimulate light sources at the player's location

menu.name: &aPress &e&lF &ato sort
lore: &7&oThis setting does not affect &e&lShift+F &7&ofor sorting containers

QuickDrop.drop: &aDropped all identical items from your inventory.

menu.name: &aDrop Identical Items
lore: &fTo drop all identical items from your inventory

QuickMove.move_to_container: &aMoved all identical items to the container.
QuickMove.move_to_player: &aMoved all identical items to your inventory.

menu.name: &aQuick Move Items
lore: &fWhen a container or inventory is open
&f2.1 Press the middle mouse button inside the container
&f   To move all identical items from the inventory to the container
&f2.2 Press the middle mouse button inside the inventory
&f   To move all identical items from the container to the inventory
&f2.3 Press the middle mouse button outside the interface
&f   To throw out all identical items

menu.name: &aQuick Edit Shulker Box
lore: &fIn the inventory, &e&lShift+Right Click &fon a Shulker Box

ReplaceBrokenArmor.broken: &aYour item has been damaged, replenished from the inventory.

ReplaceBrokenTool.broken: &aYour tool has been damaged, replenished from the inventory.
ReplaceBrokenTool.run_out: &aYour tool has run out, replenished from the inventory.

menu.name: &aAuto Replenish Tools
lore: &fWhen the item in hand is damaged/runs out
